code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import SuccessImg from"../../../assets/images/successImg.png";import UploadCheckmark from"../../../components/FileUpload/UploadCheckmark";import{gold,diamond,pinkLady,enterprise}from"../../../TestData";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SuccessMessage(props){const[card,setCard]=useState("");const[cardData,setCardData]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{switch(props.accountType){case"gold":setCardData(gold);default:break;case"diamond":setCardData(diamond);break;case"enterprise":setCardData(enterprise);break;case"pinkLady":setCardData(pinkLady);break;}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("center",{children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"kyc-success-message-container col-md-7  slide-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:"flex"},"col-md-12":true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-3",children:"\xA0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:SuccessImg,alt:"smiley",className:"col-md-9"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-md-4 success-checkmark",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UploadCheckmark,{})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("center",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{style:{color:cardData.color||"#0B0230"},children:[" ",cardData.card]})," ","Card Upgraded ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"SUCCESSFULLY"]})})]})]});}export default SuccessMessage;
